text: 4:14 Aposel 6:6; 8:17; 13:3; 19:6; 1 Timoti 1:18; 2 Timoti 1:6Nɨ fo, fomɨra siosɨn gumazamizir dapaniba uan dafariba isa nɨn dapanim garɨki. Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam akamɨn gun nɨ mɨkeme, ezɨ tuavir kamɨn God bizir aghuimɨn mɨn uan gavgavim isa ingangarim bagha nɨ ganɨngi. Ezɨ kɨ nɨ mɨgei, nɨ gavgavir kam ataghɨraghan markɨ, nɨ a sara Godɨn ingangarim damuvɨra ikɨ.
